1.plot: Hazel takes magical stones from a wishing well, and accidentally makes wishes come undone.

13.title: Charmazing Pirates
13.plot: The Charmers search for Hazel's lost tiara leads them into the land of the Pirates.

1.title: Prince Not So Charming/A Charming Outfit
1.plot: When Hazel and her friends turn a frog prince into a real prince, they must teach himto be charming before time runs out and he turns back into a frog forever. Wearing her mom's bland and plain dress from her childhood, Hazel must unlock the magic in the dress so it becomes beautiful before her school picture day.

2.title: A Charming Trio/Add a Little Parsley
2.plot: Hazel's attempt to clean up her room with magic before her mom gets home turns into a disaster. Now Posie and Lavender must help or there'll be no sleepover! When the girls accidently turn Parsley into a baby in hopes of making him younger so he'll play with them, they must figure out how to change him back to normal before his big broom race.

3.title: Double Trouble Spell/Charming Pets
3.plot: When Hazel accidentally replicates herself 11 times to clean her room quickly, she must reverse the spell before the Hazels make an even bigger mess.

4.title: A Charming Do Over/A Charming Fad
4.plot: The girls cast a 'do over' spell to repeat their spark-tacular day at the Charmville carnival but realize the day won't stop repeating over and over and over.

5.title: Lucky Seven/Moon Madness
5.plot: Feeling neglected by Hazel, Seven runs away and the girls must track him down. Trying to stay awake at a sleepover, the girls make a 'stay awake all night' spell and have a party with the mischievous moon.

6.title: Switcheroo/Garden Pets
6.plot: Hazel accidentally switches bodies with her Mom and realizes her job as Enchantressis a lot harder than she imagined. Hazel and the charmers are planning a garden party but a hairweed appears inHazel's back yard and she has to find a way to stop it growing without magic.

7.title: Freeze Dance/The Gingerbread Boy
7.plot: The girls do a freeze dance to bring on the cold weather but it works too well and Charmville becomes unbearably cold. The girls disguise a delicious smelling Gingerbread boy so no one eats him, but then he gets silly and starts pranking everyone in his path!

8.title: Spooky Pumpkin Moon Night
8.plot: On Spooky Pumpkin Moon Night, Hazel and the Charmers go to the pumpkin patch to find the best pumpkins to win the contest.

9.title: A Charming Chatterbox/Cluck Stars
9.plot: Hazel discovers an old toy of her Moms and charms it to see what will happen. Hazel wants the Charmers band to be the best in the talent show but it does not go as planned when she charms the band to sound better.

10.title: Fashion No Show/Locket or Lose It
10.plot: While trying to add something special to their fashion show outfits, the Charmer's magic gives them a result they didn't expect. When Hazel tries to fix it, things go from bad to worse. Hazel makes special lockets for Posie and Lavender but when Lavender gets charmed inside the locket instead of her photo, Hazel and Posie (with Lavender inside the locket) must travel to Ogre Valley to find the ingredients to charm her out.

11.title: Uncharmed Life/Pest Friends Forever
11.plot: Hazel charms her wand to make it "super powered" to help with Mom's "to-do list" but breaks it instead. To fix it, the Charmers need to go on a quest to find three ingredients. The Charmers mix up a harmony potion so the pond frogs will quit arguing. Hazel mistakenly gets a dose of the potion.

12.title: Charmy Hearts Day
12.plot: Hazel and her Dad make a heart shaped puzzle box for the Enchantress as a surprise. When Hazel decides to add something extra special to the gift it doesn't work out as she planned.

13.title: Hairy Ways/Calling All Cauldrons
13.plot: Hairy Ways: Hazel needs to fix a hair potion gone wrong. Calling All Cauldrons: The girls think the cauldron is broken, so they replace it with a brand new model.

14.title: Wish Upon a Jar/Upside Down Friends
14.plot: Wish Upon a Jar: Hazel catches a "wishing star" all for herself, but the wishes don't go as planned. Upside Down Friends: A harmony spell accidentally causes Flare to try to be friends with a bat.

15.title: Zip Zoom Broom/Sheepover Party
15.plot: Zip Zoom Broom: Hazel discovers a strange broom at the back of Dad's broom shop. Sheep Over Party: The Charmers have a sleepover at the Charmhouse, but they can't fall asleep.

16.title: Sparkle Bunny
16.plot: Hazel and the Charmers are in charge of stuffing eggs for the Sparkle Bunny Day egg hunt - but discover they are all missing when Sparkle Bunny shows up in the morning to get them.

17.title: Frankenflare/Charming Cheers
17.plot: Franken Flare: Flare accidentally gets upsized, and the Charmers need to figure out how to get her back to normal size. Charming Cheers: Hazel really wants to join the Charmville Cheer squad, but she doesn't want to practice.

18.title: Bean There, Done That/Charmville Unchained
18.plot: Bean There, Done That: Hazel's attempt to make Posie's plant grow faster causes trouble. Charmville Unchained: In order to finish writing her charm letters faster, Hazel uses an enchanted pen.

19.title: My Charmhouse Is Your Charmhouse/Frog for a Day
19.plot: My Charmhouse is Your Charmhouse: After the girls accidentally break Nelson the Gnome's mushroom house, they must make him a new house before he overstays his welcome. Frog for a Day: The Charmers accidentally become frogs.

20.title: Wedding Story/A Snug Little Rug
20.plot: Wedding Story: Plans for an Ogre wedding go wrong when Hazel tries to improve the decorations. Snug Little Rug: The Charmers befriend a baby magic carpet separated from its flock.

21.title: Charm Your Mom Day/A Charming Campout
21.plot: Hazel gives her Mom a jar of coupons with things that Hazel thinks Mom likes to do.But when she spells one to make it extra special, her Mom turns into a statue! Dad takes Hazel and the Charmers camping. Hazel wants to earn Charm Scoutcharms so she uses magic when she isn't supposed to and they get lost.

22.title: Somewhere Over the Rainbow/Circus Surprise
22.plot: Somewhere Over the Rainbow: Hazel charms herself into a unicorn to help a baby unicorn learn to jump rainbows. Circus Surprise: Hazel and the Charmers put on a circus for Hazel's mom and dad with a surprising final act.

23.title: Sing Song Pox/A Tooth on the Loose
23.plot: Sing Song Pox: Hazel gets the Sing-Song Pox from her dad and accidentally spreads it around Charmville. Tooth on the Loose: Hazel has a loose tooth and really wants to meet the Tooth Fairy.

24.title: Old School Magic/Charming Ogres
24.plot: Dad's Hat Magic: When Hazel spells Dad's old magic hat, things get a bit tricky. Charming Ogres: A game of Brooms and Ogres gets a little too real for Hazel and her friends.

25.title: Hurry Up Hazel/No Charm in the Charmhouse
25.plot: Hurry Up Hazel: To finish her Enchantress lessons in a hurry, Hazel casts a spell that gives her super speed. No Charm in the House: When the Charmhouse refuses to open its doors to the Little Charmers, what could be wrong?

26.title: Charming Nightlights/Charming Babies
26.plot: Charming Nightlights: Faced with a long day of enchanted chores, Hazel magics the night to come faster. Charming Babies: To earn a babysitting Charm Scout charm, the girls look after Posie's baby brother, Thistle.

27.title: Unicorn Without a Horn/Stir Crazy Charmer
27.plot: Unicorn Without a Horn: Hazel's magic fix of a baby unicorn's non-flashing horn gives the baby a foghorn instead! All Stirred Up: Hazel magics a spoon that spreads a body switching potion around town.

28.title: A Charming Mistake/A Charming Surprise Birthday
28.plot: A Charming Mistake: While on a camping trip, Hazel accidentally shrinks her parents. A Charming Surprise Birthday:Hazel accidentally traps the Charmers inside her birthday gift.

29.title: Wandering Wand/Good Knight Good Day
29.plot: Wandering Wand: Hazel's super-sized wand accidentally transforms Parsley into a super-sized baby. Good Knight, Good Day: When the Charmers play princesses, they spell Parsley to be their knight in shining armor.

30.title: Santa Sparkle
30.plot: When Hazel accidentally ruins Sparkle Night for all of Charmville, the Charmers hope that Santa Sparkle's magic will set things right. But they discover that the greatest magic of all is thinking of others before yourself.

31.title: Band on the Run/Picture Perfect Posie
31.plot: Band on the Run: After the Charmers spell their instruments to play better, they can't stop the music! Picture Perfect Posie: Hazel's painting of Posie 'captures' Posie for real, when Posie gets trapped inside!

32.title: Forget Me Not/Nelson in Charge
32.plot: Forget Me Not: Hazel tries to help Lavender memorize a potion, but a spell makes Lavender forget everything! Nelson in Charge: When their babysitter turns out to be strict, the Charmers try to spell their way to more fun.

33.title: Glass Slipper/Hazel You Shrunk the Charmers
33.plot: The Charmers' magic dancing spell makes all the shoes in town dance to their princess party! When Hazel takes a "tiny" break from her enchantress training, she and her friends shrink down to the size of mice.

34.title: Hazel Nuts/Charming Cookies
34.plot: Hazel-Nuts: Hazel gives everyone in town charmed bracelets, but the spell makes them copy Hazel. Charming Cookies: Hazel tries to win a cookie-making contest with magic and winds up with mud cookies.

35.title: A Charming Story/Magic Mayhem
35.plot: The Charmers bring Ruby, their favorite fictional heroine, to life, but it turns out she's not quite as magical outside of her book. When the fairies stop making fairy dust, the Charmers try to set things right.

36.title: Posie's Pesky Potion/Sparkle Storm Adventure
36.plot: The charmers get tangled in a spell and have to get out of it so that Posie can finish her potion. A Sparkle Storm threatens Charmville, unless Posie can learn a special song from the Fairies.

37.title: A Charming Mermaid Tale
37.plot: The Charmers transform themselves into Mermaids to rescue a baby sea unicorn.

38.title: A Charmazing Race/Dragon Daycare
38.plot: A Charmazing Race: It's Team Little Charmers versus Team Parsley in the Charmville Broom Races. Dragon Daycare: When Flare needs a playmate, Hazel accidentally makes baby dragons who go wild in Charmville!

39.title: Bigger Better Broomier/Night Owls
39.plot: Bigger, Better, Broomier!: The Charmers want flashier new brooms for an air show, hurting their old broomies' feelings. Night Owls: When the charmers go night camping, Posie's little night owl tags along for the fun.

40.title: Sparkleberry Pies/Wishing Fish
40.plot: Sparkleberry Pies: Hazel accidentally creates a scarecrow that's scared of birds. Wishing Fish: Hazel makes her little wishing fish Wanda huge in order to make big wishes come true.

imdb.title: Little Charmers
plot: Hip and edge animation that welcomes to a world of magic and imagination. With a little patience, determination and a flick of their magic wands, anything is possible.::Anonymous
